mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CTE (LVL, PATH, MENU_NO, MENU_NM, UPPER_MENU_NO, URL) AS ( SELECT 1 AS LVL, MENU_NM AS PATH, MENU_NO, MENU_NM, UPPER_MENU_NO, URL FROM PT_MENU T WHERE MENU_NO = #{sMenuNo} UNION ALL SELECT LVL + 1, CONCAT(CTE.PATH, ' > ', R.MENU_NM) AS PATH, R.MENU_NO, R.MENU_NM, R.UPPER_MENU_NO, R.URL FROM PT_MENU R INNER JOIN CTE ON R.UPPER_MENU_NO = CTE.MENU_NO ) SELECT CTE.*, (SELECT COUNT(MENU_NO) FROM PT_MENU WHERE UPPER_MENU_NO = CTE.MENU_NO) AS CHILD_MENU_CNT FROM CTE ORDER BY MENU_NO ASC
